scripts.build: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const path=require('path'); const out=path.join(__dirname,'public'); if(!fs.existsSync(out)) fs.mkdirSync(out,{recursive:true}); const copy=(s,d)=>{if(!fs.existsSync(d)) fs.mkdirSync(d,{recursive:true}); for(const f of fs.readdirSync(s)){ if(['node_modules','public'].includes(f)) continue; const sp=path.join(s,f), dp=path.join(d,f); if(fs.statSync(sp).isDirectory()) copy(sp,dp); else fs.copyFileSync(sp,dp);} }; copy(__dirname,out);"
